jm.name: JamRockOne
jm.description: JamRockOne.com offers a genre of music with concentration in Reggae and Dancehall expressions from the 1970s to present with a taste of Caribbean favour in Soca selection ruffled with R&B, Souls and top off with the world’s best Hip Hop hits.

jm.name: Jaradio Jamaica
jm.description: Live radio Station, broadcasting 24/7. Playing Dancehall, Hip Hop, R&B, Pop & Social Commentary. Ja Radio helps you connect and share with people who love music. Join thousands who are already a member and share in the fun!

jm.name: FAME 95 FM
jm.description: The Hottest Radio Station in Jamaica! Blazin' the hits from all genres by the best DJs on the Planet! Follow and Blaze!

jm.name: NCU FM
jm.description: The Northern Caribbean University Media Group, a Seventh-day Adventist service-oriented organization, has as its primary mission, to facilitate the creation and distribution of high quality productions on various media, while ensuring that our clients are treated with Christ-centred service at every level.

jm.name: RJR 94 FM
jm.description: The station broadcasts several programmes featuring Jamaican and international music, news, talk shows, listener questions and professional answers, and Ralston McKenzie's Sunday Contact, a show that reaches out islandwide by radio for missing persons.

jm.name: Stylz FM
jm.description: STYLZ FM IS KNOWN FOR IT'S GOOD MUSIC, OUR LIVE AUDIO & VIDEO STREAMING, RADIO PERSONALITIES AND ITS INTERACTIVE PROGRAMS THAT BRINGS PEOPLE FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD TOGETHER IN ONE PLACE. 'THE PEOPLE STATION'

jm.name: TBC Radio
jm.description: TBC Radio is a non-profit, Christian station that commenced operation on April 12, 1998. The station is a ministry of the Tarrant Baptist Church, which has been in service to the community since 1892. The ministry offered by The Breath of Change - TBC FM 88.5 is designed to reach a wide cross section of people in the Kingston Metropolitan area. As the Holy Spirit hovered over the waters to bring order to chaos, and as the Son of God rose victoriously at the first Easter, we know that God continues to blow the wind of the Spirit where God wills. TBC FM continues to be a part of that movement for spiritual transformation.

jm.name: Alpha Boys Radio
jm.description: Every song on Alpha Boys' School Radio features at least one person who attended, or attends, the school, a vocational school for young men in need of employment assistance. ABSR is a 24/7 celebration of the legacy established by the Kingston, Jamaica-based vocational school responsible for the education of many premiere jazz, ska, reggae and dancehall pioneers in Jamaica.

jm.name: Nationwide News Network
jm.description: We shall leverage our brand equity, talent, experience, technical infrastructure and business relationships to be Jamaica’s principal provider of accurate broadcast news (hard and soft), sports, current affairs, business and entertainment, customized for clients on our owned, and, or controlled media outlets, through employees who have been empowered and with the necessary skills thus creating value to our listeners, viewers, customers and shareholders.

jm.name: HITZ92FM
jm.description: HITZ 92 FM is the perfect blend of two of Jamaica's favourite past times, REGGAE & SPORTS as the tagline suggests, 'It's Reggae... It's Sports'. Our mandate is simple -provide Jamaicans with a radio station that is designed with THEM in mind.

jm.name: Mello FM
jm.description: MELLO FM is the only radio station transmitting from the city of Montego Bay, St. James.The ‘station that plays strong songs’ began test transmission on December 1, 2003 and on November 1, 2004, it began broadcasting to Western Jamaica (St. James, Westmoreland, Trelawny, Hanover  sections of St. Ann and St. Elizabeth).

jm.name: SunCity
jm.description: The mission of SunCity 104.9 FM is to use interactive radio broadcasting as a means to educate, empower and entertain the Jamaican populace and its diaspora through meaningful programmes geared towards the rebuilding of Jamaica, land we love.

jm.name: UFDV Radio
jm.description: Online radio based out of USA / Kingston Jamaica, Plays the best in Dance hall, Reggae, Hip Hop and Top 40

jm.name: ZIP 103 FM
jm.description: DYNAMIC, FUN, REFRESHING, HIGH ENERGY AND INNOVATIVE are the hallmarks of our programming format. We are one of the two STATE OF THE ART radio stations in Jamaica with approximately 98% effective coverage of Jamaica on 103.1, 103.3, 103.5, 103.7, & 103.9

jm.name: RebelRadioLink
jm.description: You Can Listen to a live continuous party with Selectors, Sound-Man, and DJ's around the world.

jm.name: KLAS ESPN RADIO
jm.description: Our aim is to create the Caribbean’s best and most profitable sports radio station, and to consistently reward our workers and owners by offering strong returns on their investment.

jm.name: Power 106 FM
jm.description: Power 106FM went on air in December 1992 initially pursuing an all-talk format then later shifting to a hybrid talk and music format, hence the popular slogan - 'Come for the talk, stay for the music'.

jm.name: Love 101 FM
jm.description: At the time of its birth, Love FM became the first and only religious station on the Jamaican media landscape, and quickly acquired the third highest market share locally, a position which it has held for the greater part of twenty years. After twenty years of existence, Love 101 now ranks fourth among more than twenty stations locally.

jm.name: Blitz Radio 2000
jm.description: BLITZ RADIO 2000 is an online Radio Station in Jamaica that specializes in Local and International News and Current Affairs,affecting Jamaica and the wider world.Been Jamaican based we discuss issues relating to Jamaica primarily. Our entertainment seeks to give a real Jamaican experience.

jm.name: Mega Jamz
jm.description: Founded in 2002, Mega Jamz 98FM is Jamaica's #1 old school Jammin radio station. Its musical output is bordered on hits from the 1970's, the 1980's and more (1990's and current music trends). Musical Entertainment is Guaranteed Always (MEGA).

jm.name: NewsTalk93FM
jm.description: - Stimulating, informative discussion programs- Hourly News and Weather Updates- Feature programmes such as interactive political, sports and community outreach broadcasts-Music and Entertainment

jm.name: GGFM
jm.description: GGFM  is a Jamaican Gospel Radio station Located in Discovery Bay ST.Ann We play All different types of gospel music .

jm.name: Talk Jamaica Radio
jm.description: The primary aim of Talk Jamaica Radio is to educate and inform individuals in the Caribbean and the Diaspora about issues affecting people politically, socially, economically, and culturally via our Talk Jamaica Radio platform and various social media outlets. Talk Jamaica Radio at all times embrace an all-inclusive approach by acknowledging and respecting the views of all individuals. We entertain rigorous debates and vigorously probe the issues confronting people as we seek to empower our listeners and followers on the internet and social media.

jm.name: Zanj. Radio
jm.description: Jamaican net radio based in Stony Hill, St. Andrew Jamaica, bringing you an eclectic assortment of music, art & DJs. Also find us on Twitter, Instagram, Mixcloud & Facebook.

jm.name: Pentab Radio
jm.description: To Proclaim the Whole Gospel of Jesus Christ to all men, to minister to the needs of the community, and to demonstrate the all-encompassing love of God. To submit our lives to the divine leadership of the Lord Jesus; creating and maintaining a climate that enhances the growth of all of our members into the fullness of Christ.

jm.name: Jamaican Radio
jm.description: 100% Hot mixx from Jamaica - Brand news reggae dancehall

jm.name: Kool 97 FM
jm.description: Kool 97 FM has carved out a niche market in the Jamaican media landscape since hitting the airwaves in November 2001. We programme adult contemporary music, 45% of which is Reggae music. Our target audience consists primarily of persons who are 25 years and over. This group has diverse lifestyle preferences but finds consensus on one issue - Music that is melodic and familiar, the kind they grew up with and the kind that is missing across the stretch of Jamaican bandwidth.

jm.name: Gospel FM Jamaica
jm.description: This is your station for inspirational gospel music that brings you to another level in God, and your spiritual life. Expect great music and mediation, with the word of God.

jm.name: Music 99 FM
jm.description: Music 99 can be found on 5 frequencies: 99.1, 99.3, 99.5, 99.7 and 99.9. The music played range from Jazz, Mellow Reggae, Soft Rock, Soul, Country & Western, Alternative, and Urban Contemporary.The station is known for its continuous music, playing 13 songs per hour with 3 advertisement breaks each hour at 4 minutes in length.

jm.name: Roots 96.1 FM
jm.description: Roots 96.1 FM is a community based radio station in Kingston Jamaica that is owned and operated by the Mustard Seed Communities

jm.name: Nationwide 90FM
jm.description: NationWide Radio 90.3 is a broadcast Radio station from Kingston, Jamaica, providing News, Current Affairs, Sports, Entertainment programs.

jm.name: East 96 FM
jm.description: East 96 FM was launched in 2018 and has since then established itself as being the “Voice of the East” - the adopted slogan for the station. The radio station is committed to bringing quality content influenced by St. Thomas and eastern parts of Jamaica to the rest of the country and to the world.

jm.name: Krush Yaad Radio
jm.description: Founded on January 3, 2012 www.krushyaad.com is a Jamaican based organization that started out focusing on it's online radio. Before long other services such as photography, marketing for events and Jamaican based businesses and products.  The company has now evolved and has been one of the fastest growing brands in the entertainment industry. Our fan base is now well beyond the shores of Jamaica and as a TEAM we aspire to build business and the careers of entertainers and promoters, one big family.

jm.name: Jamvybez Radio
jm.description: Jamvybez Radio listen Jamaican Reggae music and the latest in entertainment and news.

jm.name: IRIE FM
jm.description: IRIE FM had reggaelutionised the airwaves with its Reggae format. Never before has Jamaica and her people been exposed to Jamaican culture and music in the way IRIE FM has done it. IRIE FM has developed a personal relationship with its listeners, unprecedented in Jamaican media as the acronym states Innovative Radio Inspiring Everyone. And so, the greatest love story in Jamaican radio began and has become a growing force. In no time, IRIE FM carved out a special niche and endeared a large, loyal audience, becoming the peopleís number one radio station.

jm.name: Fyah 105
jm.description: Jamaica's Hit Music Station!

jm.name: FM Jamaica Radio
jm.description: FM Jamaica Radio: The Official Reggae Radio, is an internet radio station dedicated to the information and entertainment needs of Jamaicans worldwide. We aim to use information and entertainment to bridge the gap that separates Jamaicans in the diaspora.

jm.name: Gospel JA fm
jm.description: GOSPEL JA fm is a quality Jamaican Gospel Radio Station which continues to touch the lives of many in Jamaica and overseas. We are based in Kingston Jamaica. All Jamaican Gospel Artistes have a chance to be heard via our radio station once there is a positive message within the music and the song is Christ-centered.

jm.name: Praise Hymn Radio
jm.description: Praise Hymn Radio, playing the best in praise and worship, hymns and today's hottest Christian music.

jm.name: Thunderdome
jm.description: THUNDERDOME RADIO is a New Online Radio Channel broadcasting 24/7 uncensored content from Kingston Jamaica & Toronto Canada!

jm.name: DJ Robert Ministries
jm.description: Where music opens the gateway to the soul
